snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the web include protests against Uber in Paris, where a car was attacked on a freeway. Plus, an argument for why the technology in the movie “Her” might be more like what our future will look like compared to...
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the web include protests against Uber in Paris, where a car was attacked on a freeway. Plus, an argument for why the technology in the movie “Her” might be more like what our future will look like compared to “Minority Report.”

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Uber's Taxi Troubles in France, and Why 'Her' Might Offer a Glimpse of the Future
